Set.占める・しめる: to take up/ to account for

Set.使用・しよう: use (same as 使うこと (つかうこと))

Set.少々・しょうしょう: a little/ short (time) (formal for 少し (すこし))

Set.ずっと・ずっと: for a long time/ all the time/ consecutively

Set.相手・あいて: partner/ addressee/ the person you are talking to

Set.一体・いったい: one object/ body/ what on earth?/ generally

Set.馬・うま: horse/ promoted bishop (in Japanese chess known as shogi)

Set.飼う・かう: to keep/ to own (a pet)/ to raise/ to feed

Set.抱える・かかえる: to hold or carry under or in the arms

Set.家事・かじ: household matters/ housework (same as 家の仕事 (いえのしごと))

Set.被る・かぶる: to wear/ to be covered with

Set.咥える・くわえる: to hold something in the mouth

Set.訓・くん: native Japanese reading of a Chinese character

Set.避ける・さける: to avoid (physical contact)/ to ward off

Set.誘う・さそう: to invite (someone to do something with you)/ to tempt

Set.さて・さて: well/ now (typically used when switching to a new

Set.守る・まもる: to protect/ to abide (by the rules)

Set.目上・めうえ: person of higher status/ one's senior

Set.破る・やぶる: to tear/ to violate/ to defeat

Set.選手・せんしゅ: player selected for a team (usually athletic)

Set.多少・たしょう: a little (same as 少し (すこし))

Set.単位・たんい: credit (for a course in school)/ unit

Set.昼食・ちゅうしょく: lunch (same as 昼ご飯 (ひるごはん))

Set.ちょうだい・ちょうだい: -- colloquial form of ください/ typically used by children or women --

Set.捕まる・つかまる: to be arrested/ to be caught

Set.つまり・つまり: namely/ in other words/ in short

Set.デート・デート: date (in the sense of 'social engagement' only)

Set.殴る・なぐる: to strike/ to hit/ to punch

Set.婦人・ふじん: woman (same as 女性 (じょせい)、女の人 (おんなのひと))

Set.まあ・まあ: well (used when making a modest or hesitant statement)

Set.高まる・たかまる: to rise/ to grow/ to mount (v.i.)

Set.接ぐ・つぐ: to join/ to piece together/ to set (bones)/ to graft (trees)

Set.継ぐ・つぐ: to succeed (someone in a business or inheritance
